description: This course focues on the practices, production pipeline and theory related to the production of innovation short animated works of art. Workshops on story and concept development, art direction, cinematography, modeling, texturing, lighting, animation, compositing, visual effects, sound design and rendering will be timed through the semester in sequence with the collaborative production of an animated short. Visting facult and guest lecturers to the class will engage in reviews of specific aspects of the process, and discuss the individual roles of production in the context of the history of art, theater, and film production.
name: ANIMATION PRODUCTION
